author: ghudson
msg: Vote for several candidates (the ones I proposed and some others);
more votes will likely come later.
Fix a variety of whitespace issues.

author: ghudson
msg: Fix #1676 (directory can be erroneously completed) and a related bug.
* libsvn_wc/update_editor.c
(complete_directory): The anchor-not-target case appears to have
been coded as if we were updating the anchor, but it only contained
the target, neither of which is true.  We cannot mark the anchor
directory complete, and we have no cause to remove deleted or
missing entries.
(close_edit): If the target of the update is still missing after the
update, it doesn't matter whether the root was opened or not; we
still need to change it to a deleted entry.

author: ghudson
msg: Fix bugs in an unexercised code path of the status editor.
* libsvn_wc/status.c
(close_directory): Use the path of the target, not the name, to get
the dir baton of a target directory.  Don't send a status
notification unless it's sendable.

author: pmayweg
msg: * STATUS
Adding javahl bindings changes to proposed API changes.
Adding 2 javahl changes.

author: sussman
msg: Continue book work.
* ch02.xml (Repository URLs):  fix descriptions of svn:// and svn+ssh://.
* ch07.xml:  rename 'store-password' config var to 'store-auth-creds'.
* ch06.xml:  fill out the cred-caching section.
